name: Lifeless Nights
description:
Story: 

Help Tommy to escape his Nightmares and try to fight his fears. 

Every level is a nightmare in Tommys mind. 

But he needs you to learn how to escape or control his dreams. 

Be careful and patient.

special thanks to @Dr.Tronik!!!!!

Movement:

1. Jump | Space | 

2. Double Jump | 2x Space |

3. Dash | E | 

4. Shoot | Aim + Left Click |
